concept.title: Universities Ranking Analyzer overview
concept.shortdesc: The Universities Ranking Analyzer reads two CSV files (rankings and country metadata) and writes a fixed-format report to output.txt for a selected country.

section.title: Audience
section.p: Developers, QA, and support/enablement teams who need to understand the module interface and output contract.

ul.li: Inputs: TopUni.csv (university rankings) and capitals.csv (capital/continent mapping)
Output: output.txt created/overwritten in a required order (sections 1â€“9)
Counts universities and lists available countries and continents.
Finds the top international and top national ranked university in the selected country.
Computes average score for the selected country and relative score to the top university in the continent.
Looks up the capital city and lists universities whose names contain the capital.
